description: As Ruri and Sena`s game is bashed on the Internet they decide to work harder towards making a better game. As Kyousuke prepares to go home he receives a text message from Kirino telling him to throw away her collection of eroge and anime goods! Kyousuke contacts Ayase who confirms Kirino hasn`t been in contact with her since she left either. Kyousuke then meets up with Ruri who encourages him to fly to America to find the root of Kirino`s problem - and before the boy leaves she puts a special jinx on him.

titles.title: Ma petite sœur ne peut pas avoir un final comme ça !
Ore no Imouto ga Kore de Saishuukai na Wake ga Nai
There`s No Way This Is My Little Sister`s Last Episode
俺の妹がこれで最終回なわけがない
